product1.name: ChatGPT WordPress Plugin
product1.description: A tool that leverages the power of ChatGPT to build simple custom WordPress plugins, even for users with limited coding experience.
usecases: Generating code snippets for simple WordPress plugins
Assisting in WordPress plugin development for non-coders
solutions: Enables users to define plugin functionality and generate code snippets using ChatGPT
Provides a way to test and review the generated code with professional developers
Offers the potential to streamline workflow and boost productivity for WordPress plugin development

product.name: ChatGPT WordPress Plugins
product.description: A collection of WordPress plugins that integrate ChatGPT, a popular AI language model, into WordPress websites to enhance content creation, user engagement, and website functionality.
product.solutions: The plugins offer solutions for content generation, virtual assistance, chatbot integration, language translation, and more, to enhance user experience and engagement on WordPress websites.

products.name: AI Engine: ChatGPT Chatbot, Content Generator, GPT 3 & 4, Ultra-Customizable
products.description: A powerful plugin that allows creating a chatbot like ChatGPT, generating content, organizing everything in templates, suggesting titles and excerpts, tracking OpenAI usage stats, and more. It offers AI tools for translation, correction, SEO, WooCommerce product fields, etc. The plugin provides options for Fullscreen, popup, and window modes for the chatbot, Speech-to-Text with Whisper API, and internal API for various plugins.

products.name: GPT AI Power: Complete AI Pack
products.description: An open-source ChatGPT AI plugin for WordPress that enables content generation, image creation, and forms with customizable options. It offers AI training, Chat widgets, WooCommerce integration, and more. Core features include Auto Content Writer, Image Generator, WooCommerce Product Writer, AI Training, and a fully customizable chat widget and chatbot with Chat logs and long-term external memory. The plugin also provides an Index builder for Embedding and conversion of pages, posts, and products to embedding format with one click.

products.name: AI Content Writing Assistant (Content Writer, ChatGPT, Image Generator) All in One
products.description: An all-in-one solution for Content Writer, ChatGPT, and Image Generators. This plugin generates high-quality, unique content and stunning images with just one click. It offers features like Scheduled Content Generation, Image Generator, suggesting and replacing titles for previous posts or pages, Live writing system, and more. The plugin utilizes advanced AI technology for content and image generation.

products.name: AI Assistant with ChatGPT by AYS
products.description: An AI Assistant plugin that assists in generating high-quality content, connecting with the world, and assisting in writing HTML, CSS, or any other programming codes. It offers AI tools for content generation, translation, SEO, and more. Main features include ChatGPT style chatbot, Live writing, Automation, Intent Recognition, etc.

products.name: AI ChatBot
products.description: An easy-to-use, native chatbot powered by DialogFlow or OpenAI GPT-3 (ChatGPT) for WordPress. It allows chatting with site users, displaying text responses made from the WP backend, showing FAQs, and integrating with additional Add-ons like Conversational Form Builder for creating a native, menu-driven WP ChatBot experience without any DialogFlow and 3rd party integrations.

products.name: Tablesome – Data table & Workflow Automation (Contact Form Entries, Email Log, OpenAI / ChatGPT)
products.description: A plugin for saving contact form submissions, redirecting users after form submission, creating responsive data tables, importing and exporting tables and entries, and automatically exporting data to Email marketing tools. It also allows creating post tables, Woo product tables, editing tables, and exporting to platforms like HubSpot and Slack. The plugin includes an OpenAI / ChatGPT action for creating AI-generated content using Form Submission Fields as prompts.

products.name: Chatgpt, Open AI and image creation for WordPress and Chrome – Bertha AI
products.description: An AI-based content generator for writing unique content and creating images for websites. It utilizes GPT-3 AI Content generation technology from Open AI to write original content based on user input. The plugin also allows creating images from imagination, crafting marketing copy, and product descriptions.

usecases: Craft Better Headlines to Engage Visitors
Write SEO Titles and Meta Descriptions
Write Drafts for Complete Blog Posts
Create Custom Plugin for Specific Use Case
